pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This ENIGMA package is both the backend and engine to the LateralGM and RadialGM frontends. ENIGMA is a developer environment/toolchain is used to compile Game Maker games, GML (Game Maker Language) scripts, and EDL (Enigma Development Language) scripts that have syntax between GML and C++.
Cross build support status:
Android - Incomplete / Untested OSX - Incomplete / Untested WINE - Incomplete / Untested
For android support set ANDROID_SYSROOT, ANDROID_CTARGET as environment variables. For osx support set OSX_SYSROOT, OSX_CTARGET as environment variables. For wine32 support set MINGW32_SYSROOT, MINGW32_CTARGET as environment variables. For wine64 support set MINGW64_SYSROOT, MINGW64_CTARGET as environment variables.
Additional cross build documentation: https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/Mingw https://enigma-dev.org/docs/Wiki/Install:Android https://enigma-dev.org/docs/Wiki/Mac_OS_X
All cross compiled library packages and cross toolchains must be built and available in order to build for the target platform. All dependencies must have matching ABI (all 32-bit or all 64-bit) in the crossdev image(s).
The main program resides on Linux. Each target platform has built all dependencies.
You need to add the following in /etc/portage/profile/package.use.force in order to use experimental support.
----- CUT BELOW HERE ----- games-misc/enigma -android games-misc/enigma -wine ----- CUT ABOVE HERE -----
